entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
